analysis.description:
Bugis_Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol#260-264) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol#262-264)

Bugis_Crowdsale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,unsold) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/18/0xc866b5eb353a880a463bdb88e3cb873098fa3a81.sol#1): it allows old versions
